# awesome-grid-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                | Type     | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `column`     | `column`      | The column index of this item.                             | `number` | `undefined` |
| `columnSpan` | `column-span` | The number of columns that this item spanning in the grid. | `number` | `undefined` |
| `row`        | `row`         | The row index of this item.                                | `number` | `undefined` |
| `rowSpan`    | `row-span`    | The number of rows that this item spanning in the grid.    | `number` | `undefined` |
